How did Noah find all the animals and put them on the ark? This video will answer the top 20 objections to Noah's ark and the flood and will show you that Christians have real reasons to believe the truth of God's Word as found in the book of Genesis.

0:07 - How did Noah fit all the animals on the ark?
0:42 - How big was the ark?
1:36 - How many animals were on the ark?
6:19 - How many people built the ark?
7:16 - Was it just a local flood?
9:18 - Wasn't the ark box-shaped?
10:32 - What is gopher wood?
11:20 - How long did it take to build?
12:26 - How did Noah find the animals?
12:57 - Wasn't the ark pretty small?
13:42 - Wouldn't a wooden ship this huge break and sink?

16:58 - Did the flood last 40 days and 40 nights?

18:36 - Who was Noah?
19:58 - Why does the ark matter?

videos.title: Look Out Christians: This Will Change Your Mind on the Age of the Earth
videos.description:

While we can’t pinpoint it down to the exact day or year, we can get a surprisingly accurate estimate of the age of the earth if we study the Scriptures properly—and it’s not millions or billions of years old. In this video, we answer these questions and more: What is the age of the earth according to the Bible? Does “day” really mean a 24-hour period? Was the biblical flood a local or worldwide event?

videos.title: Two Animals on the Ark Turned Into Many Different Species. Here's How...
videos.description:
How quickly did two animals go from two to many different species? Take the horse kind, for example. In Genesis, after the flood, we have the account of Joseph. He was sold into slavery in Egypt, and he one day became the ruler of Egypt, second only to Pharaoh. There was a famine, and the Egyptians needed food. In Genesis 47, we are told that Joseph gave the Egyptians food in exchange for horses, flocks, herds, and donkeys. Both the horses and the donkeys are here, and there are separate words for them. This means that, in the span of 600 years from Noah to Joseph, we have gone from two animals on the ark to species that are so distinct from each other that there are separate words for them.

Watch the full video on the Answers in Genesis YouTube channel: www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ey98tT84PKA&t=788s

Answers in Genesis is an apologetics (Christianity-defending) ministry dedicated to enabling Christians to defend their faith and proclaim the good news of Jesus Christ effectively.

On our YouTube channel, you’ll find answers to your most pressing questions about key issues like creation, evolution, science, the age of the earth, and social issues. videos.title: The Flood and Mammoths Are Connected. Here's How...
videos.description:
What happened to ice age giants like the mammoths and mastodons? One factor is that we are no longer living in an ice age. The conditions produced by the flood eventually ended, and the oceans just cooled off. There was no longer heat being added from below. Without all the heat, less water vapor was added to the atmosphere and less snow was added to the glaciers. Also, with less water, the temperature started to vary a lot more. The winters got colder and the summers got hotter. In both cases, everything got drier. The glaciers started melting back, and a lot of those beautiful green grasslands these animals would graze on started to turn into deserts. And in the north, the grasslands started to become tundra.

videos.title: Changes In Living Things Can Happen Without Evolving
videos.description:
We need to recognize that sexually reproducing creatures, like dogs, only get their genetic information from their parents. Half of their DNA from mom and half from Dad. So let’s use decks of playing cards to represent genetic information in a specific kind of creature to help us understand how changes in living things can happen without them evolving. If we start with two decks, shuffling each, and dealing half of the cards from one deck and half from the other deck into a new deck, we would see the new deck we created would be different than the original ones And if you keep doing this, the decks will change every time you deal them. Some decks will look similar to others and some will be very unique. But because there’s a limited amount of cards to start with, they can only vary so much. It’s like the dog kind. You can get a variety of dogs, but they’re all still dogs.

Watch the full video on Answers TV: https://www.Answers.TV

videos.title: Atheists Will NEVER Tell You This About Fossils...
videos.description:
What do the fossils show? They show evidence of sudden appearance. Creatures are fully formed and complex without any ancestors in the layers beneath them. Let me unpack that for you.

Even a simple cell is complex. You ask any microbiologist who looks down a microscope, and they will tell you that you can fit the cell on the size of a pinpoint—and is incredibly complex. In fact, one biologist said the cell is as complex as a city the size of New York or London because it's got a brain—a control center—or a nucleus, it’s got transport networks, it’s got factories, it’s got powerhouses.

So how can we go from nothing in the fossils, to the complexity of a cell, to the complexity of creatures like flatworms and trilobites with no links in between? The truth is they did not evolve in the beginning and change into completely new creatures; they were created in the beginning by God. This observable evidence in God’s world totally agrees with what we read in God’s Word.

Want to learn more? Watch Dr. Andrew Snelling’s full presentation on the Answers in Genesis YouTube channel: https://www.YouTube.com/watch?v=6tLQX-hQMT4&t=581s
